text: Luis Enrique Oberto González (19 August 1928 – 8 August 2022) was a Venezuelan banker and COPEI politician. He was the Minister of Finance from 1972 to 1974. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1979 to 1999. He was also the chamber president from 1990 to 1994. Oberto was born in Caracas, Venezuela. Oberto died on 8 August 2022 in Caracas at the age of 93.Falleció el exministro Luis Enrique Oberto González ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Venezuelan politicians Category:Bankers Category:People from Caracas Category:Venezuelan businesspeople
title: Luis Enrique Oberto
